Posts.Content: Hi Kaz, Firstly, good luck 4 today, hope u get u,r point across,and u dont swoon!!! but seriously,I have never ( untill now) gave athought to having other boob done.I had  left mastectomy 4 weeks ago,went 4 mapping 4 radiotherapy, today, but arm was so painful,I just could,nt get it done,despite intense phisio,so put back another 2 weeks,(I dont do delays well!!!) I,m now extreamly worried bout possibly taking a risk with good boob,I couldnt ever think of going through all the chemo, again.    let me know how u get on,and again ,Good luck. Trish.
Posts.Title: MASECTOMY...... risk reducing??????
